Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: One month of oral galactose treatment initiated immediately after the STZ - icv administration , successfully prevented development of the STZ - icv - induced cognitive deficits .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| STZ - icv - induced cognitive deficits |

In the given paragraph, the "Disease" entity is referred to as "STZ - icv - induced cognitive deficits". This term indicates the cognitive impairments that are induced by the intracerebroventricular (icv) administration of streptozotocin (STZ).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| STZ - icv - induced cognitive deficits |

In this paragraph, the only clear "Disease" entity is "STZ - icv - induced cognitive deficits", which refers to the cognitive impairments resulting from the administration of streptozotocin (STZ) through the intracerebroventricular (icv) route. The term "STZ - icv" represents the method of inducing the cognitive deficits, not a separate disease entity.
